sub_title: Brand Communication Consultant @ ASML | Expertise in Elevating Brands through Marketing, Analytics and Strategy
summary:
Strategic Brand Manager | Expert in Driving Brand Growth and Engagement 🌟

Greetings,

Thank you for visiting my profile. I am a seasoned strategic marketer, known for catalyzing brand transformations. Over 14 years, I've honed expertise in marketing, e-commerce, creative, digital, and strategy, poised to revolutionize your brand's trajectory.

My specialty lies in generating substantial impact. Whether it's pioneering campaigns or introducing game-changing products, my track record speaks of turning visions into tangible, revenue-driving realities.

As a forward-thinking strategist, I lead industry trends, predicting shifts and crafting the future of brands. This foresight translates into actionable strategies that supercharge growth and exceed objectives.

In the world of marketing, I am a force to reckon with. From ideation to execution, I deliver results that make a difference. My forte lies in transforming consumer and corporate brands into narratives that inspire, engage, and convert.

Outside the professional realm, I find joy in crafting delectable confections, exploring new literary worlds, and embarking on adventures to vibrant locales. A proud dog person, I revel in the company of our furry companions. Moreover, I'm dedicated to continuous learning and am currently advancing my proficiency in Dutch to an B1 level.

If you're in search of a proven leader with an illustrious history of delivering impactful results and a reputation for propelling brands to new heights. Whether you're in need of advice or exploring opportunities, feel free to reach out.

And here's a quirky fact: I thrive under deadlines. Pressure has always brought out the best in me. 🚀

awards.title: Top 20 Shortlisted Nominees for Growth and Innovation
awards.description:
The Women In Corporate Awards 2019 are awarded to women who have significant achievements to show, as Innovation, Diversity or Growth Champions within their organisations and industries. Nominees must be currently employed, and can come from any industry or a range of business functions, including Corporate Strategy, Marketing, Human Resources, Learning & Development, Finance & Investment, Operations, Supply Chain and associated areas. 
​
Adjudged by an eminent panel consisting of experts across domains, functions and diverse life experiences, the Women In Corporate Awards 2019 is designed to bring to light the growing presence and success of women in India Inc. Jury members would consider a range of metrics to evaluate nominees for the awards, including Insight Generation, Strategy Formulation, Stakeholder Management, Disciplined Execution and Impact Assessment. 
​
To facilitate assessments, the awards will be structured under 3 categories presented below: Emerging WICA, Luminary WICA and Trailblazer WICA.

awards.title: Best Footwear Brand
awards.description:
Kids Stop Press is one of India's biggest parenting portal. With the marketing activities and brand association that was done with Kids Stop Press, from doing influencer management, to running contests, seeding the products and having yearly cross collaborations.

Crocs India bagged the Best Footwear Brand for children during my tenure.

awards.title: Global Marketing Excellence Awards 2016 - Best use of Social Media in Marketing
awards.description:
Crocs, global footwear celebrated its victory at the Global Marketing Excellence Awards 2016, where the brand was recognized for ‘Best use of Social Media in Marketing’. 

The event was held at Taj Lands End, Mumbai on November 24th, 2016.

profile_positions.description:
🔹Drove a 25% increase in brand awareness through the development and execution of an effective ASML brand strategy, meticulously aligned with long-term strategic and annual business plans.
🔹Orchestrated and executed a comprehensive digital marketing strategy, integrating engaging social media content, resulting in a substantial rise in customer engagement and attraction.
🔹Established and meticulously tracked marketing Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), ensuring seamless alignment with business objectives. Proficiently managed a $5M marketing budget, leading to an impressive 10% increase in marketing ROI.
🔹Advised senior management on crucial aspects of Brand, Performance, Retention, and Partner/Partnership teams, leveraging insights on market trends, competition, and consumer behavior. This data-driven approach culminated in well-informed decision-making.
🔹Cultivated robust brand relationships through adept management of PR activities, engaging with media representatives and stakeholders. Executed impactful employee branding and activation initiatives, resulting in a substantial 20% increase in positive brand sentiment.
🔹Collaborated closely with product development teams, ensuring seamless alignment of product offerings with the overarching brand strategy. This effort led to enhanced brand consistency and a notable 10% increase in market share.
🔹Successfully managed strategic partnerships and collaborations, significantly enhancing brand visibility and credibility.
🔹Implemented crisis management strategies and protocols, safeguarding the ASML brand reputation. Continuously monitored and enhanced brand performance through comprehensive analysis and reporting, resulting in a significant 10% improvement in brand perception.
profile_positions.title: Brand Communication - IT Data Analytics Consultant

profile_positions.description:
🔹Strategized and executed the global brand strategy, overseeing planning and project management for both Europe and APAC regions, resulting in a 15% surge in market share and a highly successful market launch.
🔹Directed the implementation of an integrated communication plan, including precise customer needs assessment, translation into creative briefs, effective management of the creative process, and strategic planning for global launches. This initiative led to a significant 20% increase in brand awareness and a commendable 10% rise in customer loyalty.
🔹Initiated the introduction of innovative sales tools, persuasive promotional literature, and other product-related resources, tailored for both internal and external customers. This resulted in a substantial 15% boost in sales productivity.
🔹Formulated a comprehensive strategic plan for revenue growth, skillfully integrating influencer marketing and dynamic content creation. Managed execution within stringent budgetary parameters, resulting in a noteworthy increase in revenue.
🔹Provided leadership and mentorship to a team of 6 full-time colleagues, fostering an environment of continuous improvement. This effort significantly elevated team morale, leading to enhanced productivity and consistently successful project deliveries.
profile_positions.title: Digital and Corporate Communication Manager

profile_positions.description:
🔹Developed and executed a global marketing strategic plan in collaboration with product line management, corporate and regional marketing, IT/Digital, and commercial teams.
🔹Led marketing efforts for all U2opia group product categories, implementing initiatives that drove substantial user acquisition, engagement, and retention. This resulted in significant revenue growth.
🔹Differentiated value propositions in the market through strategic marketing approaches. 🔹Leveraged leadership skills and experiences to enhance the marketing function, encompassing talent, structure, processes, tools, and techniques.
🔹Drove employee branding and engagement initiatives, cultivating a motivated and cohesive team. 🔹Oversaw corporate communications (internal and external), branding, content creation, events, digital marketing, lead generation, partner marketing, and sponsorships.
🔹Managed agency relationships to accelerate marketing initiatives and collaborated with channel partners to stimulate product demand in diverse markets.
🔹Effectively managed the marketing budget in close collaboration with the CEO and CMO, optimizing spending to maximize ROI.
profile_positions.title: Deputy General Manager Marketing

profile_positions.description:
🔹Directed the development and execution of the brand vision, driving robust growth strategies in the Indian market and achieving a notable 35% increase in sales revenue.
🔹Conducted comprehensive market research and analysis, pinpointing key opportunities and optimizing consumer segmentation. This led to a substantial 20% improvement in customer engagement and loyalty.
🔹Collaborated seamlessly with cross-functional teams, including the Creative & Design unit, Regional Sector Leaders, Agency, and Lead Markets, to craft and implement Global Brand Strategies. This endeavor yielded an impressive 25% increase in brand awareness.
🔹Established and achieved precise, measurable Objectives/Goals/Strategies, harmonizing both regional and cross-functional efforts. This led to a commendable 30% enhancement in digital marketing ROI.
🔹Co-led the development of pivotal Brand Foundational Tools, encompassing Brand Segmentation, Architecture, and Promise. This initiative contributed to a significant 15% boost in brand consistency and recognition.
🔹Formulated a comprehensive strategy and portfolio rooted in competitive intelligence and trends analysis, driving a notable 20% increase in market share.
🔹Served as the primary spokesperson and key liaison for press engagements, contributing to a remarkable 30% rise in media coverage.
🔹Strategically orchestrated influencer and celebrity partnerships, resulting in an impressive 40% surge in product reviews and heightened social media engagement.
profile_positions.title: E –commerce & Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
🔹Lead and managed a team of 15+ people.
🔹Managed multiple projects from concepts through completion.
🔹Developed creative programs and design concepts that meet the business objectives of the organization and that advance our brand strategy.
🔹Established creative direction for the entire line of online services and programs.

profile_positions.title: Deputy Manager - Brand Design and Communication

profile_positions.description:
🔹Directed comprehensive brand communication for Cinepolis across diverse media channels including Print, Out-of-home, In-Property, Broadcast, Online, and Social Media, establishing a strong brand preference.
🔹Generated innovative marketing collateral such as online mailers, brochures, launch materials, and more, resulting in impactful brand representation and increased audience engagement.
🔹Conceptualized, oversaw, and executed integrated marketing campaigns for the successful launch of 9 properties in India, including two of the largest multiplexes in Pune and Thane, driving substantial market penetration.
🔹Fostered and sustained relationships with both national and international brands, contributing to brand collaborations and partnerships.
🔹Managed the advertising account of a global beverage partner, significantly boosting annual revenues by INR 5.5 Crore.
🔹Formulated compelling business cases for key strategic initiatives, successfully introducing pioneering technology to the Indian movie exhibition industry.
🔹Orchestrated 360-degree launch events for multiplexes, ensuring a dynamic and memorable introduction to the market.
🔹Pioneered brand alliances through strategic tie-ups with various partners, enhancing the reach and impact of marketing efforts.
🔹Coordinated with vendors for on-site creative execution and collaborated with media agencies for effective press releases, ensuring seamless implementation of marketing strategies.
🔹Designed a comprehensive Marketing calendar with strategically planned promotions for the entire calendar year, optimizing promotional efforts and maximizing brand exposure
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager Creative Design and Marketing

profile_positions.description:
🔹Worked on visual design projects for esteemed clients including Nokia, Aircel, Videocon, Dewars, Panasonic, IBM, Hindustan Times, Bacardi, Micromax, Microsoft, Adidas, and Longines, demonstrating versatility and expertise in catering to diverse clientele.
🔹Oversaw the coordination and production of graphic design and art direction for all clients, spanning ideation and execution across various print media formats. This included but was not limited to ads, newsletters, report covers, annual reports, brochures, exhibit displays, maps, slide shows, and AV presentations.
🔹Delivered a comprehensive 360-degree design experience, providing valuable analysis and insights to enhance the quality and impact of designs created by others.
